valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Mon 2 Feb 2026 to 12:00 (UTC) on Tue 3 Feb 2026
general_synopsis: New low expected Shannon 979 by 0600 tomorrow

Viking.text:
Wind
In southwest, southeasterly 6 to gale 8. In northeast, southeasterly 4 to 6.
Sea state
In southwest, rough or very rough. in northeast, moderate or rough.
Weather
In southwest, snow showers. In northeast, mainly fair.
Visibility
In southwest, good, occasionally very poor. In northeast, good.

Weather
In north, rain then showers. In south, rain or thundery showers.
